name: Dave's Theory of Gravity
description:
Dave’s Theory of Gravity is a puzzle game with somewhat different physics.

Alone on a space station Dave does not know where he is or what his purpose is. His only comfort is the disconnected voice that keeps him company.

But he does know that he can defy physics by pulling objects to his hand.

To move through the space station he must throw both objects and himself through the odd gravitational fields covering the station.

Controls

WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
Right mouse - Drag objects to hand
Left mouse - Force push object from hand

Credits

Made in five days during Castle Game Jam in 2016 by

- Mateusz Pilski
- Julius Sandgren
- Andreas Wilcox
- Erik Häggström
- Henri Sarasvirta
- Daniel Wilcox
